item.title: Reply to 'How to add dynamic data in source of html using Javascript' on stackoverflow at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/11465306/how-to-add-dynamic-data-in-source-of-html-using-javascript:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to 'How to add dynamic data in source of html using Javascript' on stackoverflow at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/11465306/how-to-add-dynamic-data-in-source-of-html-using-javascript:

Check the value of the control on document ready and adjust the div visibility accordingly.
